general.integratedtunnels.description: Transfer other stuff over Integrated Dynamics networks.
advancement.integratedtunnels.import_all: 使用物品輸入口輸入所有的物品
advancement.integratedtunnels.export_ite: 使用物品輸出口向一個儲物箱輸出，直到其裝有10個物品
advancement.integratedtunnels.import_ite: 使用物品輸入口向一個儲物箱中輸入所有被列表標記的物品
advancement.integratedtunnels.export_enc: 在物品輸出口中使用能否附魔 (enchantable) 運算符以向一個儲物箱輸出所有可附魔物品
advancement.integratedtunnels.drop_all_i: 用物品投擲口投擲所有物品
advancement.integratedtunnels.pickup_ite: 用物品拾取口一次拾取5個物品
advancement.integratedtunnels.break_ston: 用方塊破壞口挖掘石頭
advancement.integratedtunnels.place_logw: Place any log using a World Block Exporter by using the 'logWood' ore dictionary list
advancement.integratedtunnels.click_swor: Click with a Diamond Sword using a Player Simulator
parttype.parttypes.integratedtunnels.int: Attaches an energy holder to the network
parttype.parttypes.integratedtunnels.imp: Pick up energy from the world
parttype.parttypes.integratedtunnels.int: Attaches an item inventory to the network
parttype.parttypes.integratedtunnels.imp: Pick up items from the world
parttype.parttypes.integratedtunnels.int: Attaches an fluid tank to the network
parttype.parttypes.integratedtunnels.imp: Pick up fluids from the world
Pick up blocks from the world
aspect.aspecttypes.integratedtunnels.boo: 給定的 NBT 標籤是否必須為物品 NBT 標籤的子集。
給定的 NBT 標籤是否必須為物品 NBT 標籤的超集。
若為 true，所有無 NBT 標籤的物品都不會被匹配。
嵌套 NBT 標籤及列表是否應被遞推檢查
給定的 NBT 標籤是否必須為流體 NBT 標籤的子集。
給定的 NBT 標籤是否必須為流體 NBT 標籤的超集。
若為 true，所有無 NBT 標籤的流體都不會被匹配。
嵌套 NBT 標籤及列表是否應被遞推檢查
方塊只有在產生掉落物的情況下才能被破壞
aspect.aspecttypes.integratedtunnels.int: 將選擇第n個實體。-1為隨機實體。
aspect.aspecttypes.integratedtunnels.boo: 要嘛連續點擊要嘛單次點擊。
處理所有指定列表外的物品。
是否模擬潛行中（按住 shift ）的玩家。
如果介面以循環順序進行疊代， 則忽略優先度。
If only the exact given amount is allowed to be moved, not less.
如果是空值作為過濾器則表示匹配所有，否則不匹配。
If the instance should be crafted if it is not present in the network.

_comment_16: ------ On the Dynamics of Integration contents ------
info_book.integratedtunnels.introduction: &l集成管道&r為&l集成動力&r的擴展內容，用於在&l集成動力&r網路中傳輸物品，流體和能量。

You can use &lIntegrated Dynamics&r logic to configure filters, which can be as complex as you desire. &o"I want to send 3 enchantable pickaxes with a damage value less than 10 to this chest every tick"&r or &o"I want to fill this tank until it has 1000mB of oil, but only when my machine is working and if I have less than 10 iron ingots in this chest"&r No problem! &lIntegrated Tunnels&r can do that for you, and it will do it efficiently as well!
info_book.integratedtunnels.concepts.tex: &l集成管道&r為不同類型的傳輸加入3個新的組件：&o輸入口&r，&o輸出口&r和&o介面&r。
輸入口(藍色)將試圖從一個目標中抽取物品傳輸到同一網路的介面(白色)。
輸出口(橙色)將試圖從同一網路的介面(白色)向一個目標推送物品，同一網路下，物品將始終從左往右傳輸。
你可以向你的網路加入多個介面，並分配優先度以指定首先應填充/清空哪些。
Furthermore, you can also add multiple Importers and Exporter, again with relative priorities.
Using &lIntegrated Dynamics&r variables, you have to specify what items should be moved. If you want to keep it simple, and just move everything, simply use a blank &lVariable Card&r.

Note that if you have an autocrafting mod such as &lIntegrated Crafting&r installed, then you will be able to use the &oCraft&r setting in exporters. This will make it so that if an ingredient is not available for export, that it should be crafted.
info_book.integratedtunnels.item.text1: Move items over the network. Import items into the network using &lItem Importers&r into &lItem Interfaces&r. Export items from the network using &lItem Exporters&r from &lItem Interfaces&r.
info_book.integratedtunnels.fluid.text1: Move fluids over the network. Import fluids into the network using &lFluid Importers&r into &lFluidInterfaces&r. Export fluids from the network using &lFluid Exporters&r from &lFluid Interfaces&r.
info_book.integratedtunnels.energy.text1: Move energy over the network. Import energy into the network using &lEnergy Importers&r into &lEnergy Interfaces&r. Export energy from the network using &lEnergy Exporters&r from &lEnergy Interfaces&r.
info_book.integratedtunnels.world.item.t: &lItem World Importers&r and &lItem World Exporters&r can be used to place items in the world, pick them up, and interact with entities that have an inventory, such as dropped Shulker Boxes and Donkeys. Various aspect properties exists to change things like dispensing, throw-velocity, pickup delay, pitch and yaw.
With &lFluid World Importers&r and &lFluid World Exporters&r, you can place fluid source blocks, pick them up and interact with entities that are a tank, such as dropped tank items. Various aspect properties exists to change things like whether or not a block update should be caused.
info_book.integratedtunnels.world.energy: The &lEnergy World Importers&r and &lFluid World Exporters&r help you interact with entities that have an energy buffer, such as dropped batteries.
The &lBlock World Importers&r and &lBlock World Exporters&r allow you to place blocks and break them. Various aspect properties such as silk touching are available.
info_book.integratedtunnels.player.text1: Any experienced Minecrafter knows that the less you have to click, the better. With the &lPlayer Simulator&r, you can automate away a large part of this tedious clicking. It allows you to automate clicking with any hand and item. Advanced properties allow you to change things like click positions and so on.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.in: This section contains several tutorials that help you to learn &lIntegrated Tunnels&r, the &lIntegrated Dynamics&r add-on for item, fluid and energy transfer.

&oInterfaces&r are parts that can be attached to &lCables&r. An item, fluid and energy version exists for them, which respectively connect to inventories, tanks and energy machines. &oInterfaces&r make the target accessible to the network.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.im: &oItem Importers&r will move items from the target towards one of the &oItem Interfaces&r. &oItem Exporters&r do the opposite, they will move items from any of the &oItem Interfaces&r to the target.
Place an empty &lVariable Card&r inside a &lItem Importer&r to import all items into the network from a target inventory.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.ex: Read the number of items in the target inventory using an &lInventory Reader&r, and only move items until the total number of items is larger than &610&0.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.im: Import all items a certain list to the target inventory. An item list can be created by reading it from any &lInventory Reader&r.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.ex: Export all enchantable items to the target inventory. This can be done using a certain &lOperator&r.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.wo: Simular to &oItem Importers&r and &oItem Exporters&r, &lWorld Item Importers&r and &lWorld Item Exporters&r can respectively pick up items from the world into your item network and place items into the world from your item network. Furthermore, these can also be used to interact with dropped items that have inventories, such as &oShulker Boxes&r.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.dr: Place an empty &lVariable Card&r inside a &lWorld Item Exporter&r to drop all items from the network on the ground.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.pi: Write a constant number &65&0 to a &lVariable Card&r, and place it inside a &lWorld Item Importer&r to pick up 5 items at a time from the target space.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.wo: Instead of dropping items in the world or picking them up, you can also break and place blocks using the &lWorld Block Importer&r and &lWorld Block Exporter&r. Various aspect properties allow you to change properties such as whether or not the blocks should be silk touched when breaking.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.br: Make a &lVariable Card&r containing a reference to the &8Stone&0 item value. Place this inside a &lWorld Block Importer&r to break only Stone blocks. Also have a look at the various aspect properties to see if you can manage to silk touch the Stone to avoid receiving just Cobblestone.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.pl: Try creating a system using the &lWorld Block Exporter&r that only places wooden logs. Do this using the &lOredictionary Values&r operator to retrieve a list of all &ologWood&r oredictionary items.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.cl: 厭倦了長時間的點擊？不如試試用&l玩家模擬器&r代替？先合成一個玩家模擬器並放入含有&o鑽石劍&r的&l變數卡&r，這樣它會自動從網路中抽取一把&o鑽石劍&r進行攻擊。
